doc.title: Al barbaro del ritmo
doc.plot: Tropicana All Stars Orchestra and Latin Music celebrities offer a tribute to Benny More, an icon of Cuban music. This documentary tells the creation of Tropicana All Star, a Latin Music orquestra based in Miami, and a concert performed by it, to honor to Benny More. Stock footage and interviews with the most outstanding celebrities of Cuban and Latin music, bring a trip to the roots of Cuban music and portrait the unique talent of Benny More.
